file_content.text: Excuse me. Whitat doesn't want me talking to outsiders.
Sorry you had to see that.
So, you're the ones who killed my Magar? You look younger in person.
It can't have been easy to get these guns here. Thank you. Now what do I owe you?
Danla, darling. I just heard the terrible news. It's a tough time for a woman to be alone out here.
But don't worry. I won't let anyone take advantage of that.
This guy a friend of yours?
Who is this?
I'm sorry. I was talking with the lady.
This is a private discussion.
I'm Whitat. This is my town. And those are my guns you're returning, from my men you killed.
Our debt is to the lady.
She just lost her husband. Don't go nosing around.
Show some respect!
Oh, you're her protector now? Way I understand it, you two just killed her husband. Maybe I should defend her from you.
I think Danla Zin can decide for herself who she wants to talk to.
Aren't you two sweet. But this is my army, not Danla Zin's.
Whatever she's offering for those munitions, I'll double it.
I'm guessing you've got a strong opinion about this?
Corso? What do you think?
There's no amount of money that would make me give this brute a blaster.
Ma'am? You still interested in buying these weapons?
Thank you, son. You're a good boy. I hope your mama appreciates that.
Pleasure doing business with you, sir.
Double? Sold!
Captain! How can you do that? Can't you see how he's looking at her!
Your boy's out of line, Captain. Better have a word with him.
Now, here's your credits. If you'll excuse me, I think I'll be needed to comfort the new widow.
Our deal is with Danla Zin.
Forget it.
Thank you, miss.
Thank you, boys.
This is my life's savings here. I'd match Whitat's offer if I could.
Now, you move on out. We don't need you anymore.
What? This is my town!
You're no better than the Imperials. Go see if they'll have you! We'll take back Balmorra on our own!
